answers.answer: The conversation guide includes Romanian, English, Ukrainian (Latin alphabet), and Ukrainian (Cyrillic alphabet).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The guide provides common phrases translated into Romanian, English, Ukrainian (Latin alphabet), and Ukrainian (Cyrillic alphabet) for basic conversation needs.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Basic conversation'.

answers.answer: Essential medical phrases include needs like 'I need a doctor,' 'I feel sick,' 'I am pregnant,' and information about conditions like 'I am diabetic' or 'I am allergic to...'. It also includes terms for 'Diaper,' 'Powdered milk,' and 'Hospital.'
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Medical help'.

answers.answer: The guide helps by providing translations for various places like 'Police,' 'Ambulance,' 'Pharmacy,' and 'Shop,' along with phrases such as 'Where is…?', 'There,' and 'Here.'
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Places and directions'.

answers.answer: Information regarding transport options includes translations for 'Car,' 'Bus,' 'Airport,' 'Ticket,' 'Train station,' 'Train,' and 'Ferry-boat.'
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Transport'.

answers.answer: The guide assists with document and money questions by providing translations for terms like 'Documents,' 'Identity Card,' 'Passport,' 'Driver's license,' 'Money,' 'Currency exchange,' 'ATM,' and 'Lawyer.'
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Documents - Money'.

answers.answer: Sprijin de Urgență can help with resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: People can request or provide resources on Sprijin de Urgență.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Un Acoperiș offers support in finding temporary accommodation or provides a space to help vulnerable people coming to Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: One can access or provide temporary accommodation via Un Acoperiș by searching for or offering accommodation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: Someone would use these phrases when they need help, are scared, require medical assistance, or need to contact emergency services such as the police, ambulance, or firefighters.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and read the sections under 'Basic conversation', 'Medical help', and 'Places and directions'.
